title: Considerations & tradeoffs
description: Tableland offers a solution to the suboptimal standards, and choosing a chain greatly impacts user experience & costs.

frontMatter.title: Considerations & tradeoffs
frontMatter.description: Tableland offers a solution to the suboptimal standards, and choosing a chain greatly impacts user experience & costs.
frontMatter.synopsis: Selecting the chain to deploy tables on has a significant impact on the subsequent usage of the table. But before selecting a chain to then use Tablelandâ€™s capabilities, it may be helpful to consider the alternatives to Tableland in the first place.
